caption_text: Figure S5 The acceptance map of the Upper and Top detectors at a Vdec of (a) 0, (b) -100 V, and (c) -
snippet_text:
Figure S5 The acceptance map of the Upper and Top detectors at a Vdec of (a) 0, (b) -100 V, and (c) -
300 V. The topographic contrast in the Upper detector increases as the Vdec increases, and the material 
and charge contrasts transfer from the Upper detector to the Top detector as the Vdec increases.
